alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 7:57PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN AVOYELLES AND NORTH CENTRAL ST. LANDRY PARISHES THROUGH 830 PM CST... At 757 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cottonport, or 7 miles southwest of Moreauville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bunkie, Simmesport, Moreauville, Bordelonville, Morrow, Cottonport, Mansura, Evergreen, Plaucheville, Goudeau, Big Cane, Dupont, Big Bend, and Hamburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
